summary: ICP (Internet Computer) dapp template implemented: a React/Tailwind marketing site for a tutoring/teaching service with an enquiry submission flow backed by a Motoko canister, plus Internet Identity-based admin authentication/authorization to review enquiries.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister for enquiry capture and admin listing
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko to accept enquiry submissions and expose an admin-only interface to list/review enquiries, with authorization layered in the backend.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration (frontend)
existing_features.description: Frontend authentication via Internet Identity with actor initialization and login/logout support used to access protected admin functionality.

existing_features.title: Admin authorization guard for protected routes/pages
existing_features.description: Route/component guard that restricts access to admin views unless the user is authenticated/authorized.

existing_features.title: Enquiry submission UI and client hook
existing_features.description: Public enquiry form UI with a submission hook that calls the backend canister to persist enquiries.

existing_features.title: Admin enquiries list UI with retrieval hook
existing_features.description: Admin UI to fetch and display submitted enquiries using a dedicated hook that calls the backend canister under authenticated context.

existing_features.title: Marketing homepage with sections (Hero/About/Classes/Approach/Enquiry)
existing_features.description: Homepage composed of multiple content sections (hero, about, classes/subjects, teaching approach) and an embedded enquiry section.

existing_features.title: Shared site layout (Header/Footer) and navigation
existing_features.description: App layout components implemented for consistent header/footer framing across pages.

existing_features.title: Shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: Shadcn/ui component suite and related frontend configuration added for consistent UI primitives (buttons, dialogs, forms, etc.).

existing_features.title: Generated brand assets included in frontend public directory
existing_features.description: Generated image assets added under frontend/public/assets/generated for branding/visual design, including hero, logo, icons set, plus additional section illustrations (about, classes collage) and a pattern tile.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template scaffolding for ICP + React
existing_features.description: Project includes a reusable build-template scaffold (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml, pnpm workspace, image utility scripts, and frontend lint rules) to build and deploy the React frontend and Motoko backend to ICP.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui with Vite tooling.
Authentication uses Internet Identity; admin UI is gated via an AdminGuard and authenticated actor.
Backend canister written in Motoko implements enquiry submission and admin-only listing with an authorization layer/mixins.
Build-template directory provides a reusable ICP + React/Motoko scaffold including deployment scripts, workspace config, and frontend lint rules.
